t=int(raw_input())
mod=1000000007
fact=[]
def power(a,b):
    if b==0:
        return 1
    else:
        l=power(a,b/2)
        l=(l*l)%mod
        if b%2==1:
            return (l*a)%mod
        return l


def factoria(n):
    fact.append(1)
    for i in range(1,100010):
        num=(fact[i-1]*i)%mod
        fact.append(num)



while t>0:
    temp=raw_input().split(' ')
    n=int(temp[0])
    k=int(temp[1])
    if n<k:
        print "0"
    else:    
        factoria(100000)
        ans1=fact[n-k]
        ans2=fact[k]
        ans=(power(ans1,mod-2)*power(ans2,mod-2))%mod
        ans=(ans*fact[n])%mod
        print ans
    t=t-1
